item.title: Java project
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

cool.

i would do:
player > combat > mage > sub directory linked to mage, implements combat
> range > sub directory linked to archer, implements combat
> melee > sub directory linked to solider, implements combat

instead of:
player > combat > mage, range, melee
> mage > mage class
> range > archer class
> melee > solider class

just for personal preference, instead of just implementing the combat class; although your going for an OOP approach…so i guess so.

Read full topic
